ai.title: AI Agents
ai.subtitle: Learn about DeepTrans Studio's AI agent architecture and how it works

introduction.title: AI Agent Overview
introduction.description: DeepTrans Studio adopts an Agent-based architecture, breaking down the translation process into multiple specialized intelligent agents. Each agent is responsible for specific tasks, completing the full translation workflow through collaboration.

architecture.title: Agent Architecture
architecture.description: All AI agents inherit from the BaseAgent base class, providing a unified interface and configuration method.

baseAgent.title: BaseAgent Base Class
baseAgent.description: The base class for all agents, providing unified configuration, prompt building, and execution interface.
features: Support quality levels (draft, review, final) and formality (informal, neutral, formal)
Unified prompt building mechanism with internationalization support

agentTypes.title: Agent Types
agentTypes.description: Based on functionality, the system includes the following types of agents:

agentCategories.name: Preprocess Agents
agentCategories.description: Document preprocessing-related agents for extracting and processing document content

agents.name: DocumentTermExtractAgent
agents.description: Document terminology extraction agent that extracts professional terms from documents
agents.purpose: Automatically identify and extract term candidates from documents during project initialization

agents.name: DocumentTermTranslateAgent
agents.description: Document terminology translation agent that translates extracted terms into target language
agents.purpose: Batch translate extracted terms to generate terminology comparison tables

agentCategories.name: Pre-translate Agents
agentCategories.description: Pre-translation stage agents responsible for terminology processing and initial translation

agents.name: MonoTermExtractAgent
agents.description: Monolingual terminology extraction agent that extracts term candidates from source text
agents.purpose: Identify professional terms in source text, preparing for subsequent dictionary queries and translation

agents.name: DictLookupAgent
agents.description: Dictionary lookup agent that searches for term translations in dictionaries
agents.purpose: Query project dictionaries, public dictionaries, and private dictionaries to obtain standard term translations

agents.name: TermEmbedTranslateAgent
agents.description: Terminology embedding translation agent that embeds terms into text for translation
agents.purpose: Apply terms during translation to ensure consistency and accuracy of term translation

agentCategories.name: QA Agents
agentCategories.description: Quality assessment and checking related agents

agents.name: SyntaxMarkerExtractAgent
agents.description: Syntax marker extraction agent that extracts syntax markers from source and target text
agents.purpose: Identify syntax structure, preparing for syntax evaluation

agents.name: SyntaxEvaluateAgent
agents.description: Syntax evaluation agent that evaluates the grammatical correctness of translations
agents.purpose: Check grammatical issues in translations, identifying syntax errors and inconsistencies

agents.name: SyntaxAdviceEmbedAgent
agents.description: Syntax advice embedding agent that generates improvement suggestions based on evaluation results
agents.purpose: Generate syntax-improved translation versions based on syntax evaluation results

agentCategories.name: Post-edit Agents
agentCategories.description: Post-editing stage agents responsible for discourse optimization and polishing

agents.name: DiscourseQueryAgent
agents.description: Discourse query agent that searches for similar segments in translation memory
agents.purpose: Find relevant translation references through hybrid search (vector retrieval + keyword matching)

agents.name: DiscourseEvaluateAgent
agents.description: Discourse evaluation agent that evaluates the discourse quality of translations
agents.purpose: Check translation coherence, fluency, and discourse-level issues

agents.name: DiscourseEmbedAgent
agents.description: Discourse embedding agent that optimizes translations based on evaluation results and reference segments
agents.purpose: Combine translation memory and discourse evaluation results to generate more natural and fluent translations

tools.title: Agent Tools
tools.description: Agents can use the following tools to enhance capabilities:

items.name: Dictionary Tool
items.description: Dictionary query tool supporting term queries in public, project, and private dictionaries

items.name: Memory Tool
items.description: Translation memory tool supporting hybrid search (vector retrieval + keyword matching), returning relevant translation memories

workflow.title: Agent Workflow
workflow.description: Execution order of agents in the translation workflow:

steps.description: Extract terms, query dictionaries, apply terms for translation
Extract syntax markers, evaluate syntax, generate improvement suggestions
Query similar segments, evaluate discourse, optimize translation

configuration.title: Agent Configuration
configuration.description: Each agent can be configured through AgentConfig:
